mapper.insert: insert into `client` ( name, sale_man_id, input_man_id, traceTimes, lastTraceDate, bookDate,transferDate nextTraceDate, weChatNum, QQNum, tel, school, degree_of_intention_id, intention_school_id, intention_class_id, state_id, isManTrace, remark, buildDate,inputDate, source_of_client_id, age, gender, email, address, school_id, education_id, hometown_id, collegeAdmissionTime, major_id, years_of_work_experience_id, introduce_man_id, pay_status_id, withComputer, clientAttentionWhat, client_type_id,client_state ) values (#{name}, #{saleMan.id}, #{inputMan.id}, #{traceTimes}, #{lastTraceDate}, #{bookDate},#{transferDate} #{nextTraceDate}, #{weChatNum}, #{QQNum}, #{tel}, #{school}, #{degreeOfIntention.id}, #{intentionSchool.id}, #{intentionClass.id}, #{stateId}, #{isManTrace}, #{remark}, #{buildDate}, #{inputDate}, #{sourceOfClient.id}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{address}, #{clientMajor.id}, #{education.id}, #{hometown.id}, #{collegeAdmissionTime}, #{major.id}, #{yearsOfWorkExperience.id}, #{introduceManId}, #{payStatusId}, #{withComputer}, #{clientAttentionWhat}, #{clientTypeId},#{clientState.id} )
mapper.update: update `client` set name= #{name}, sale_man_id = #{saleMan.id}, input_man_id = #{inputMan.id}, traceTimes = #{traceTimes}, lastTraceDate = #{lastTraceDate}, bookDate = #{bookDate}, nextTraceDate = #{nextTraceDate}, weChatNum = #{weChatNum}, QQNum = #{QQNum}, tel = #{tel}, school = #{school}, degree_of_intention_id = #{degreeOfIntention.id}, intention_school_id = #{intentionSchool.id}, intention_class_id = #{intentionClass.id}, state_id = #{stateId}, isManTrace = #{isManTrace}, remark = #{remark}, buildDate = #{buildDate}, inputDate = #{inputDate}, source_of_client_id = #{sourceOfClient.id}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, school_id = #{clientMajor.id}, education_id = #{education.id}, hometown_id = #{hometown.id}, collegeAdmissionTime = #{collegeAdmissionTime}, major_id = #{major.id}, years_of_work_experience_id = #{yearsOfWorkExperience.id}, introduce_man_id = #{introduceManId}, pay_status_id = #{payStatusId}, withComputer = #{withComputer}, clientAttentionWhat = #{clientAttentionWhat}, client_type_id = #{clientTypeId}, client_state = #{clientState.id} where id = #{id}

update `client` set name= #{name}, weChatNum = #{weChatNum}, QQNum = #{QQNum}, tel = #{tel}, intention_school_id = #{intentionSchool.id}, intention_class_id = #{intentionClass.id}, source_of_client_id = #{sourceOfClient.id}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, school = #{school}, education_id = #{education.id}, hometown_id = #{hometown.id}, major_id = #{major.id}, years_of_work_experience_id = #{yearsOfWorkExperience.id}, withComputer = #{withComputer}, client_type_id = #{clientTypeId} where id = #{id}
update client set state_id=#{stateId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.name, input_man.id input_man_id, input_man.username input_man_username, input_man.realname input_man_realname, sale_man.id sale_man_id, sale_man.username sale_man_username, sale_man.realname sale_man_realname, c.traceTimes,c.name, c.age, c.gender, c.lastTraceDate, c.bookDate,c.nextTraceDate, c.weChatNum, c.QQNum, c.tel, c.school, c.email, c.address, c.degree_of_intention_id, c.intention_school_id, c.intention_class_id, c.state_id, c.isManTrace, c.remark, c.client_state, degreeOfIntention.id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, intentionSchool.id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, clientState.id clientState_id, clientState.name clientState_name, hometown.id hometown_id, hometown.name hometown_name, major.id major_id, major.name major_name, yearsOfWorkExperience.id yearsOfWorkExperience_id, yearsOfWorkExperience.name yearsOfWorkExperience_name, education.id education_id, education.name education_name, sourceOfClient.id sourceOfClient_id, sourceOfClient.name sourceOfClient_name, clientMajor.id clientMajor_id,clientMajor.name clientMajor_name from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join clientmajor clientMajor on clientMajor.id=c.school_id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id where c.id = #{clientId}

select id, name, sale_man_id, input_man_id, traceTimes, lastTraceDate, bookDate, nextTraceDate, weChatNum, QQNum, tel, school, degree_of_intention_id, intention_school_id, intention_class_id, state_id, isManTrace, remark, buildDate,inputDate, source_of_client_id, age, gender, email, address, school_id, education_id, hometown_id, collegeAdmissionTime, major_id, years_of_work_experience_id, introduce_man_id, pay_status_id, withComputer, clientAttentionWhat, client_type_id,client_state from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id

select count(c.id) from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join clientmajor clientMajor on clientMajor.id=c.school_id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id where state_id=0

select c.id,c.name, input_man.id input_man_id, input_man.username input_man_username, input_man.realname input_man_realname, sale_man.id sale_man_id, sale_man.username sale_man_username, sale_man.realname sale_man_realname, c.traceTimes,c.name, c.age, c.gender, c.lastTraceDate, c.bookDate,c.nextTraceDate, c.weChatNum, c.QQNum, c.tel, c.school, c.email, c.address, c.degree_of_intention_id, c.intention_school_id, c.intention_class_id, c.state_id, c.isManTrace, c.remark, c.client_state, degreeOfIntention.id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, intentionSchool.id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, clientState.id clientState_id, clientState.name clientState_name, hometown.id hometown_id, hometown.name hometown_name, major.id major_id, major.name major_name, yearsOfWorkExperience.id yearsOfWorkExperience_id, yearsOfWorkExperience.name yearsOfWorkExperience_name, education.id education_id, education.name education_name, sourceOfClient.id sourceOfClient_id, sourceOfClient.name sourceOfClient_name, clientMajor.id clientMajor_id,clientMajor.name clientMajor_name from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join clientmajor clientMajor on clientMajor.id=c.school_id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id where state_id=0 limit #{startIndex},#{rows}

select c.id, input_man.id input_man_id, input_man.username input_man_username, input_man.realname input_man_realname, sale_man.id sale_man_id, sale_man.username sale_man_username, sale_man.realname sale_man_realname, c.traceTimes,c.name, c.age, c.gender, c.lastTraceDate, c.bookDate,c.nextTraceDate, c.weChatNum, c.QQNum, c.tel, c.school, c.email, c.address, c.degree_of_intention_id, c.intention_school_id, c.intention_class_id, c.state_id, c.isManTrace, c.remark, c.client_state, srg.id srg_id, srg.totalmoney srg_totalmoney, srg.totalreceiptmoney srg_totalreceiptmoney, srg.unpaidmoney srg_unpaidmoney, bill.id bill_id, bill.state bill_state, cam.id cam_id, cam.name cam_name, g.id g_id, g.name g_name, degreeOfIntention.id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, intentionSchool.id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, clientState.id clientState_id, clientState.name clientState_name, hometown.id hometown_id, hometown.name hometown_name, major.id major_id, major.name major_name, yearsOfWorkExperience.id yearsOfWorkExperience_id, yearsOfWorkExperience.name yearsOfWorkExperience_name, education.id education_id, education.name education_name, sourceOfClient.id sourceOfClient_id, sourceOfClient.name sourceOfClient_name from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join studentReceiptGather srg on srg.client_id = c.id left join receiptbill bill on bill.client_id = c.id left join campus cam on bill.campus_id = cam.id left join grade g on bill.grade_id = g.id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id where c.state_id in(1,3,4)

select c.id,c.name, input_man.id input_man_id, input_man.username input_man_username, input_man.realname input_man_realname, sale_man.id sale_man_id, sale_man.username sale_man_username, sale_man.realname sale_man_realname, c.traceTimes,c.name, c.age, c.gender, c.lastTraceDate, c.bookDate,c.nextTraceDate, c.weChatNum, c.QQNum, c.tel, c.school, c.email, c.address, c.degree_of_intention_id, c.intention_school_id, c.intention_class_id, c.state_id, c.isManTrace, c.remark, c.client_state, degreeOfIntention.id degreeOfIntention_id, degreeOfIntention.name degreeOfIntention_name, intentionSchool.id intentionSchool_id, intentionSchool.name intentionSchool_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id, intentionClass.name intentionClass_name, clientState.id clientState_id, clientState.name clientState_name, hometown.id hometown_id, hometown.name hometown_name, major.id major_id, major.name major_name, yearsOfWorkExperience.id yearsOfWorkExperience_id, yearsOfWorkExperience.name yearsOfWorkExperience_name, education.id education_id, education.name education_name, sourceOfClient.id sourceOfClient_id, sourceOfClient.name sourceOfClient_name, clientMajor.id clientMajor_id,clientMajor.name clientMajor_name, acceptMan.id acceptMan_id,acceptMan.username acceptMan_username from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join clientmajor clientMajor on clientMajor.id=c.school_id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id left join employee acceptMan on acceptMan.id=c.accept_man_id where state_id=2 limit #{startIndex},#{rows}

select count(c.id) from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join clientmajor clientMajor on clientMajor.id=c.school_id left join datadictionaryitem degreeOfIntention on c.degree_of_intention_id=degreeOfIntention.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionSchool on c.intention_school_id=intentionSchool.id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on c.intention_class_id=intentionClass.id left join datadictionaryitem clientState on c.client_state=clientState.id left join datadictionaryitem hometown on c.hometown_id=hometown.id left join datadictionaryitem major on c.major_id=major.id left join datadictionaryitem yearsOfWorkExperience on c.years_of_work_experience_id=yearsOfWorkExperience.id left join datadictionaryitem education on c.education_id=education.id left join datadictionaryitem sourceOfClient on c.source_of_client_id=sourceOfClient.id left join employee acceptMan on acceptMan.id=c.accept_man_id where state_id=2

sql.if: and (c.name LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%") or c.tel LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%"))

mapper.select:
select c.id, input_man.id input_man_id, input_man.username input_man_username, input_man.realname input_man_realname, sale_man.id sale_man_id, sale_man.username sale_man_username, sale_man.realname sale_man_realname, c.traceTimes,c.name, c.age, c.gender, c.lastTraceDate, c.bookDate,c.nextTraceDate, c.weChatNum, c.QQNum, c.tel, c.school, c.email, c.address, c.degree_of_intention_id, c.intention_school_id, c.intention_class_id, c.state_id, c.isManTrace, c.remark, c.client_state, bill.id bill_id, bill.totalMoney bill_totalMoney, bill.receiptMoney bill_receiptMoney, bill.receiptTime bill_receiptTime, bill.state bill_state, pay.id pay_id, pay.payname pay_payname, cam.id cam_id, cam.name cam_name from client c left join employee sale_man on sale_man.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee input_man on input_man.id=c.input_man_id left join receiptbill bill on bill.client_id = c.id left join payment pay on bill.payment_id = pay.id left join campus cam on bill.campus_id = cam.id
where c.client_state = 1
